thread.section_title: Easy Comforts Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Easy Comforts | www.easycomforts.com | 6 of 218
thread.title: PATRICIA RISHER
thread.title_full: Easy Comforts reviewed by PATRICIA RISHER

author: PATRICIA RISHER
title: PATRICIA RISHER
text: Polite courteous representative helped me with my telephone order. She was efficient and through in completing the order. My order was delivered within the time promised. However I was not notified when my order was shipped, did not receive tracking nor delivered notification. Was very pleased and completely satisfied with products ordered.
